other_title: クラシカロイド 第2シリーズ
opening_theme: "ClassicaLoid: ClassicaLoid no Theme (ClassicaLoid ～クラシカロイドのテーマ～)" (eps 2-)
ending_theme: #01: "Shuppatsu Shinkou!! Densetsu e ~From the New World Chapter 4~ (出発進行!!伝説へ ～新世界から第4楽章より～)" by Chisato feat. Miku (ep 1)
#02: "Muteki no Sonata ~From The Symphony No. 7~ (無敵のソナタ～交響曲第7番より～)" by Tomoyasu Hotei feat. Takanori Nishikawa (ep 2)
#03: "Love Game Daisakusen ~From Le nozze di Figaro~ (ラブゲーム大作戦 ～フィガロの結婚より～)" by tofubeats feat. Ruka Endou and Rie Fujishiro (ep 3)
#04: "Koinu no Carnival ~From Valse du Petit Chien~ (小犬のカーニバル ～小犬のワルツより～)" by EHAMIC (ep 4)
#05: "Life is beautiful ~From The Great~ (Life is beautiful ～ザ・グレートより～)" by Schbert (Tomoaki Maeno) (ep 5)
#06: "How to Win! ~From Toccata und Fuge in d-Moll~ (How to Win! ～トッカータとフーガより～)" by Yukoh Kusunoki (ep 6)
#07: "Ai no Ya no Yume (愛の矢の夢)" by Daisuke Asakura feat. Yoko Ishida (ep 7)
#08: "Ainekuraine Yoru no Music (アイネクライネ・夜のムジーク)" by tofubeat feat. Kana Hoshizaki (ep 8)
#09: "Song for the moon ~From Moonlight Sonata~ (Song for the moon ～月光より～)" by Tomoyasu Hotei feat. Jasmine Rodgers (ep 9)
#10: "Ai no Kane ~From La La Campanella (~愛の鐘 ～ラ・カンパネラより～)" by Daisuke Asakura feat. Hiroyuki Takami (ep 10)
#11: "Salty Salty (ソルティソルティ)" by CLASKEY:KLASKY (ep 11)
#12: "make the revolution ~From Die Walküre~ (make the revolution～ワルキューレの騎行より～)" by Wagner (Yoshitsugu Matsuoka) (ep 12)
#13: "Dai Uchuu Ongaku Sanka No.9 ~From Sinfonie Nr. 9 d-moll op. 125~ (大宇宙音楽讃歌No.9 ～交響曲第9番より～)" by Tomoyasu Hotei feat. Yuuji Kishi (ep 13)
#14: "GOING SWEET HOME ~From New World Chapter 2~ (GOING SWEET HOME ～新世界から第2楽章より～)" by Chisato feat. Shou (A9) (eps 14, 20)
#15: "Houjou no Yume ~From Für Elise~ (豊穣の夢～エリーゼのためにより～)" by Tomoyasu Hotei feat. Ayako Tanaka (ep 15)
#16: "Jounetsu ni Tsuite Kataru Beki 2, 3, no Shinjitsu ~Denen yori~ (情熱について語るべき2、3の真実 ～田園より～) by Daisuke Hasegawa (ep 16)
#17: "Mephisto Sheriff ~From Mephisto-Walzer (Mephisto Sheriff ～メフィスト・ワルツより～)" by Daisuke Asakura feat. Nami Tamaki (ep 17)
#18: "Kakumei Sanka ~From Die Meistersinger von Nürnberg~ (革命賛歌 ～ニュルンベルクのマイスタージンガーより～)" by Kouichi Tsutaya feat. Nobuyuki Takatsuto (MAGIC OF LiFE) (ep 18)
#19: "Have a Nice Day! ~ From Oboe Concerto~ (HAVE A NICE DAY! ～オーボエ協奏曲より～)" by tofubeats (ep 19)
#20: "Japanimation Eiyuu Polonaise (ジャパニメーション英雄ポロネーズ)" by EHAMIC (ep 21)
#21: "Ai dake ga Subete Janai! (愛だけがすべてじゃない！)" by CLASKEY:KLASKY (ep 22)
#22: "Yami wo Kirisaku Hikari ~From Siegfried Funeral Music ~ (闇を切り裂く光 ～ジークフリートの葬送行進曲より～)" by Kouichi Tsutaya feat. Naumi (ep 23)
#23: "Unmei, Kuzure Ochiru. ~From Symphony No. 5~ (運命、崩れ落ちる。 ～交響曲第5番より～)" by Tomoyasu Hotei feat. Satoshi Hashimoto (ep 24)
